Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:13#300911#Cromos} is a fascinating creature. A guardian spirit patterned after a real animal that adapts scavenged equipment into workable armor.

They also eat just about anything, including gauges meant for other creatures. Data recovered from those would be a fascinating project. Your next task is to get some.

As expected. These gauges record a fascinating energy...one similar to something...it is not right to speculate. Leander, child of Karas, or Eria, child of Elinu, are the senior researchers. They should know.

Does the double howl of the {@LinkCreature:13#300911#cromos} frighten? Pay it no heedâ€”stay focused on the task at hand.

Elleon never shied from danger, though there are those who claim this was his undoing. Were the retrieval of power gauges his task, no doubt it would be finished already.

Perhaps another round of gathering might be in order.
